oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from J.C. Felts to his sister, Jinnie H. Fly
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter from Rock Island Prisoner of War Camp expresses a soldier's wish for his family to write, send care packages, and give updates to the whereabouts of a friend so that he may be written to.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
